Text: And leave comments please! If you like this game, give me a thanks :D

How to install this game (and other ISO and CSO games): Connect your PSP to your PC. Make sure you got a Custom Firmware, if not, download one and install it. If you got, you need to create a folder in ():PSP and name it to ISO. Then place the CSO or ISO to here and wait for the copy to finish and you can simply launch it from Game -> Memory Stick :D Have fun!
Note: If your game is an eboot.pbp file, place it to a folder in the ():PSPGAME folder and name it as you like.
Okay, it looks like this torrent got some seeder. Good work :D
